Package sailpoint.integration

Interface HttpClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApacheHttpClient, SailPointHttpClient
    public interface HttpClient
    An HttpClient issues HTTP requests.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String OPT_CLOSE_IDLE_CONNECTIONS
      Optional that may be passed into setup that will specify the timeout in seconds to close idle connections
      static java.lang.String OPT_MAX_HOST_CONNECTIONS
      Option that may be passed into setup that will allow configuration of the maximum number of connections per host
      static java.lang.String OPT_MAX_TOTAL_CONNECTIONS
      Option that may be passed into setup that will allow configuration of the maximum number of total connections
      static java.lang.String OPT_TRUST_ALL_CERTS
      Option that can be passed into setup that will causes all certificates to be trusted when using SSL.
      static java.lang.String[] OPTS
      All of the options accepted by setup.

    • Field Detail

      • OPT_TRUST_ALL_CERTS

        static final java.lang.String OPT_TRUST_ALL_CERTS
        Option that can be passed into setup that will causes all certificates to be trusted when using SSL. This defaults to false if not set.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPT_MAX_HOST_CONNECTIONS

        static final java.lang.String OPT_MAX_HOST_CONNECTIONS
        Option that may be passed into setup that will allow configuration of the maximum number of connections per host
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPT_MAX_TOTAL_CONNECTIONS

        static final java.lang.String OPT_MAX_TOTAL_CONNECTIONS
        Option that may be passed into setup that will allow configuration of the maximum number of total connections
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPT_CLOSE_IDLE_CONNECTIONS

        static final java.lang.String OPT_CLOSE_IDLE_CONNECTIONS
        Optional that may be passed into setup that will specify the timeout in seconds to close idle connections
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPTS

        static final java.lang.String[] OPTS
        All of the options accepted by setup.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        void setup​(boolean useSSL,
           int port,
           java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password,
           java.lang.String timeoutInSeconds,
           java.util.Map options)
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Setup this client using the given configuration.
        Parameters:
        useSSL - Whether to use SSL or not.
        port - The port to use for the requests.
        username - The username for basic HTTP auth (optional).
        password - The password for basic HTTP auth (optional).
        timeoutInSeconds - The request timeout in seconds (optional).
        options - A map of options used to configure this client (optional).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setup

        void setup​(boolean useSSL,
           int port,
           java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password,
           java.lang.String timeoutInSeconds,
           java.util.Map options,
           java.lang.String sslProtocol)
    throws java.lang.Exception
        *Setup this client using the given configuration.**
        Parameters:
        useSSL - Whether to use SSL or not.*
        port - The port to use for the requests.*
        username - The username for basic HTTP auth (optional).
        password - The password for basic HTTP auth (optional).
        timeoutInSeconds - The request timeout in seconds (optional).
        options - A map of options used to configure this client (optional).
        sslProtocol - custom SSL/TLS version.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
